help-file.title: ZONES
help-file.content: The majority of the Duris world is made up of different areas commonly called "zones". Within these zones, a variety of things can be found, they are filled with mobs, equipment and numerous other things. A set theme normally follows within each zone, created by the zone builder, and there several different level ranges a zone is intended for. Before exploring, it might be wise to type "credits".
